title: Dormant Funds (Administration) Act, 1966
description: Official consolidated text of Dormant Funds (Administration) Act, 1966 (XX of 1966) published by The Pakistan Code (Service Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and commencement
provisions.content:
(1) This Act may be called the Dormant Funds
(Administration) Act, 1966.
(2) It shall come into force at once.

provisions.title: Section 2. Vesting of dormant funds in the President and their utilisation
provisions.content:
(1)
Notwithstanding anything contained in any other law or instrument, the funds specified in the
Schedule, together with interest and profit accruing thereon, shall vest forthwith in the President.
(2)     The amounts in the aforesaid funds, other than that in the Palestine Aid Fund, shall be
transferred to the Presidentâ€™s Relief Fund instituted on the 16th May, 1965, and shall be utilised for
purposes of relief or for purposes as nearly as possible, to those for which they were raised.
(3)     The amount in the Palestine Aid Fund shall be utilised for the Palestine cause.
___________
Name of the Fund                                          Rs.
(1)   Quaid-e-Azam Bihar Relief Fund                                          41,82,659.33
(2)   Palestine Aid Fund                                                      7,06,151.36
(3)   Prime Minister's Refugee Hut Building Fund                              3,09,254.30
(4)   Pakistan Fund                                                           6,00,000.00
(5)   Muslim League Fund (India)                                              6,00,000.00
RGN Date:-29.03.2024
